column1:
!

@constantinian,

I'm glad you're considering React programming and Django! They're both great tools for building web applications.

React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It's declarative, meaning you specify what your UI should look like, and React takes care of the rest. This makes it easy to create well-structured, composable UIs.

Django is a web framework for building reusable back-end components. It has built-in ORM and template syntax that make it easy to dynamically generate HTML pages.

 Together, React and Django make a great team for creating performant and extensible web applications. Thanks for considering them!
